{{primarysources|date=February 2013}}
'''Partha Niyogi''' (July 31, 1967 â€“ October 1, 2010) was the Louis Block Professor in [[Computer Science]] and [[Statistics]] at the [[University of Chicago]].<ref>{{Cite web
  | last = University of Chicago
  | title = Niyogi, Partha, Obituary
  | url= http://news.uchicago.edu/news.php?asset_id=2122
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref> 
He is known for his work in [[artificial intelligence]], especially in the field of [[manifold learning]] and [[evolutionary linguistics]].<ref>{{Cite web
  | last = Google Scholar
  | title = Niyogi, Partha
  | url= http://scholar.google.com/scholarhl=en&q=partha+niyogi&btnG=&as_sdt=1%2C11&as_sdtp
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref><ref>{{Cite web
  | last = University of Chicago
  | title = Partha Niyogi Memorial Conference 
  | url= http://parthaniyogiconference.cs.uchicago.edu/
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref> He wrote more than 90 academic publications and two books.<ref>{{Cite web
  | last = Partha Niyogi,
  | title = Publications,
  | url= http://people.cs.uchicago.edu/~niyogi/papers.htm
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref><ref>{{Cite web
  | last = Amazon
  | title = Niyogi, Partha, The Computational Nature of Language Learning and Evolution,
  | url= http://www.amazon.com/Computational-Language-Learning-Evolution-Linguistics/dp/0262513390/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1358173341&sr=8-1&keywords=partha+niyogi
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref><ref>{{Cite web
  | last = Amazon
  | title = Niyogi, Partha, The Informational Complexity of Learning: Perspectives on Neural Networks and Generative Grammar,
  | url= http://www.amazon.com/The-Informational-Complexity-Learning-Perspectives/dp/0792380819/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1358173341&sr=8-2&keywords=partha+niyogi
  | accessdate = 2013-01-14
  | postscript = <!--None-->}}
</ref>
